info.name: Facebook JAK's Gradient Style Without Animation
info.description:
This userstyle is directly based on Facebook JAK's Gradient Rounded Style by Khoa Lê (JAK).

***All credits belongs to Khoa Lê (JAK) and I own nothing of it***

I personally recommend you to at least try Khoa Le (JAK)'s original style here for your best experience.

This version strictly follow JAK's style design and only disable all Animations, Transformations and Transitions due to their laggy behavior on slow PCs.

If there's any feature you guys wanna re-enable, please edit the source-code yourself, since it's very well coded with good conventions.

I may be able to update this version to match JAK's style development once in a while, so please stay tune.
info.additionalInfo:
2018.4.6:
+ Fix consistency of Image Rotate Transformation on Hover, now applies to most images.
+ Fix priority of Image Rotate Transformation on Hover, so it will no overlay floating buttons.
+ Fix some minor performance issues.
+ JAK has stop updating his style so I'm just trying to fix what I can, there might be no more update in the future.


2018.1.28:
+ Added Segoe UI font for better text display
